title: New: Paul White – Street Lights Feat. Danny Brown
body:
With the release of _Old_ rapidly approaching, Danny Brown has upped-the-ante in guest appearances over the last few weeks.

His latest track is a collaboration with the UK-based producer Paul White, who contributed three beats to Brown’s excellent _XXX._

Although Brown has toned down his rapping recently, ‘Street Lights’ finds the MC breaking out a flow that would not be out of place on his last album. The Paul White beat displays dizzy drums that could easily pose a challenge to a less accomplished barsmith, but Danny Brown excels over it. He raps about social issues and the difficulties of living in a violent city, which, if Brown hadn’t already mentioned his change in lyrical direction, would come as a surprise. Luckily though, he sounds as hungry and vital as ever.

‘Street Lights’ is being released as a single on the 15th April and you can give the track a spin below.
